-- VTK version is 9.0
-- Trilinos root is /lib/cmake/Trilinos
-- Trilinos_VERSION = 12.17
-- Checking if MPI is enabled in Trilinos: MPI ENABLED
-- MATLAB root is /usr/local/MATLAB/R2020a
-- GENERATOR is Unix Makefiles
-- MPI disabled
-- setting flags for GCC compiler
-- BUILD TYPE: RELEASE
-- CXX_COMPILER:               /usr/bin/c++
-- GLOBAL COMPILER FLAGS:       -fopenmp -O3 --fast-math -W -Wall -pedantic -std=c++11 -Wfatal-errors -fPIC
-- GLOBAL SHARED LINKER FLAGS:  -Wl,--as-needed
-- GLOBAL EXE LINKER FLAGS:     -Wl,--as-needed
-- Configuring done
-- Generating done
